nodes.text:
The Ikas-Adno 22-B Nightfalcon was a versatile speeder bike, suitable for city navigation, racing, and military and security uses. It could carry one passenger in addition to the pilot and held four kilograms of cargo.
It cost 6,250 credits when new.
It was one of Ikas-Adno's most popular models. It was not as fast as Aratech's 74-Y speeder bike or 74-Z speeder bike, but offered a good mix of speed and strength that owners appreciated.
Known users include former podracer Ree.
